title: Question 19:
description: Is there an on-going telegram campaign?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value: No, all official looking SNX telegram groups are scams. SNX Team members will never contact you and offer to sell you SNX. If you experience someone that appears to be a Synthetix team member offering you SNX, in Telegram or Discord, know that they are impostors trying to scam you.. To help protect the community please report the scammers on telegram @NoToScam refer to this [link](https://telegram.org/faq) or on [Discord](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
